EmailTemplate.name: Missing Enclosures
EmailTemplate.subject: Missing Enclosures {!Case.Employee__c}, # {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.OwnerFirstName},
The following enclosures are missing for the report dated (insert Service Date Thru) on the above noted Case:
(LIST MISSING ENCLOSURES)
If the enclosures are not received within 48 hours of the request, the report will be distributed without them and your billing time for the activity will have to be deducted.
Please FORWARD this email to reports@isyscm.com notifying us that the enclosures have been uploaded and that we can proceed with processing your report.
We appreciate your prompt response and your cooperation.
Thank you.
